people_also_ask.question: Can you still play Rome Total War?
people_also_ask.heading: No – you can still play the original ROME: Total War and, if you don't already own it, ROME: Total War is included when you purchase Total War: ROME REMASTERED. If you already own ROME: Total War, it will still be present and playable on Windows in your Steam library. ARE OTHER TOTAL WAR GAMES BEING REMASTERED?
people_also_ask.title: TOTAL WAR: ROME REMASTERED FAQ - SEGA Support

people_also_ask.question: Is Rome Total War a good game?
people_also_ask.heading: It says loads about Total War that the lowest entry on this list isn't a poor game—it's just not as great as people hoped. The still-excellent original Rome set a high bar, but that wasn't the only issue: Rome 2 had a flawed launch and played like an uneasy transition to a more advanced game engine (which it was).07-Sep-2021
people_also_ask.title: The best Total War games | PC Gamer

people_also_ask.question: Is Total War Rome 2 a good game?
people_also_ask.heading: Fortunately, you can ignore the system and carry on regardless, which means you're free to enjoy a rather good Total War game. ... Right now, Rome 2 has its flaws, but is still a sumptuous, slow-burn strategy game with some of the best land battles in the series. Aesthetically, it's a triumph.02-Sep-2013
people_also_ask.title: Total War: Rome 2 review | PC Gamer
